trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Minden
There were no other sightings in Minden on or around March 25th 2008
Summary: UFO came over mountain, performed impossible maneuvers and left straight up
divs: Sighting DetailsAt about 0735 on 3-25-08 a disc type object was observed by me moving from north to south from the direction of Carson City toward the Minden Airport. The disc decended from a cloud deck at about 8K just beyond a mountain near what is known locally as Johnson Lane. It performed a series of tight right hand turns just inside the bottom of the cloud deck and then exited straight up thru the deck and disappeared. Distance from my observation point to the disc is estimated at 1.5 miles to 3 miles. The turns were noted as high speed and almost right angle turns which would be impossible for conventional aircraft. No noise was detected during the observation of piston or jet aircraft.
